fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2023e3.equipments.meter.mil

Class ElectricMeterElectricityModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.Model
      • fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.AtomicModel
        • fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.models.AtomicHIOA
          • fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2023e3.equipments.meter.mil.ElectricMeterElectricityModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.models.interfaces.VariableDefinitionsAndSharingI, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.models.interfaces.VariableInitialisationI, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.interfaces.AtomicModelI, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.interfaces.EventsExchangingI, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.interfaces.ModelI, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ElectricMeterElectricitySILModel

    @ModelImportedVariable(name="currentHeaterIntensity",type=java.lang.Double.class) @ModelImportedVariable(name="currentHairDryerIntensity",type=java.lang.Double.class)
public class ElectricMeterElectricityModel
extends fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.hioa.models.AtomicHIOA
    The class ElectricMeterElectricityModel defines the MIL simulation model for the electric meter electricity consumption.

    Description

    This model is an HIOA model that imports variables, hence shows how this kind of models are programmed.

    • Imported events: none
    • Exported events: none
    • Imported variables: name = currentHeaterIntensity, type = Double
    • Exported variables: name = currentHairDryerIntensity, type = Double

    White-box Invariant

     invariant       STEP > 0.0

    Black-box Invariant

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Created on : 2023-10-02

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
